name: Kyle Thousand
brandStatement: Starting with a passion for aesthetic design and artwork, my love of functionality and structure evolved into my web development career. My working method comes from a place of approachability, creativity, and calm under pressure. My success has come through my innate ambition, attention to detail, and my commitment to continue refining my skills through learning.

experience.description: Member of a small web development team building applications from the ground up. Participated in planning and strategizing web app development with Agile and Waterfall methodology. Involved in the plotting of features with time and priority estimation, utilizing Jira Kanban boards and Roadmaps, as well as Airtable communication. Cooperation with UX/UI team in development of feature-based design. Application development in both frontend and backend, conducting and receiving code reviews, management of Git branches, and building of common packages to be used across applications. Demonstrating app development to both clients and company management. Adapting to new technology stacks.

Developed fluency in React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Github, Node. js, Express, SQL, MongoDB, etc over the course of 400+ hours in professional software programming training. Developed full stack applications with full CRUD functionality, applying key languages and computer science concepts including algorithms and data manipulation. Managed team-based projects using Github version control.

experience.role: Deluxx Fluxx Detroit, Standby, The Skip, Chartreuse Kitchen and Cocktail, the Oakland
experience.description: Managed a large team comprising both front of house bar staff, back of house kitchen staff, as well as stage production teams, social media team, sound teams, and security. Aided in budget management and reporting to the accountant. Headed and managed award winning cocktail programs. Winner of Glenfiddich 2016 Kindred Spirits and Global finalist for Peter F. Heering Sling Award 2015. Featured in Tasting Panel Magazine, Difford’s Guide, Bar Business Magazine, Esquire’s Best Bars in America in 2015.
